title: Woman aged 75 gives birth to her first baby after undergoing IVF treatment
text:

A 75-year-old woman has given birth to a baby girl after conceiving through IVF.

The tiny tot was born premature at just 30 weeks, weighing just 1lb 8oz, according to doctors in Kinker Hospital, a private hospital in Rajasthan, India.

The newborn had been put on ventilator immediately after the birth but she was removed today as doctors says she is stable and recovering.

Prabha Devi had told doctors her age, and conceived the child through IVF, after several years of failed attempts to have a child naturally.

She and her 80-year-old husband had adopted a child earlier but wanted IVF as they longed for their own child.

Dr Abhilasha Kinker, gynaecologist and obstetrician who delivered the baby said: "Prabha Devi had come to our hospital 4-5 days before the delivery.

"We conducted Doppler sonography and found there were complications in her pregnancy so we decided to deliver the child through Cesarean section.

"She was ill and old and we couldn't take chances with her and the child's life.

"She had already carried the child for over six months which was very surprising for her age.

"If we had not delivered the baby, she might have died in the womb."

The doctor said she is not sure about Prabha Devi's age as she couldn't verify it as the couple didn't furnish their age-related documents but it was a complicated pregnancy as she "was very old".

(Image: Getty)

Dr Abhilasha said: "She told us her age but showed no proof. She looked between 72-75. Her husband told us he is 80.

"It was surprising for me.

"Her age was a factor and then she was ill. She has one collapsed lung so it was a very challenging operation."

The mother has been discharged but the child is kept at the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit of the hospital where the doctors are monitoring her condition.

"She is at neonatal intensive care unit. We are monitoring her. The mother cannot feed her unless she gains weight.

"She needs to be at least 3.3lbs to be allowed home from hospital. She is stable and recovering fast."
description: Prabha Devi and her 80-year-old husband, from Rajasthan, India, had already adopted a child, but wanted to have a biological child too
